FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

Mobile hotspot lets you share your phone's cellular data connection with other devices like laptops, tablets, or other phones. Your phone essentially becomes a portable WiFi router that other devices can connect to.

It depends on your usage. 5GB is good for occasional email and light browsing. 10GB works well for regular use including some video streaming. 20GB is ideal for heavy users who work remotely or travel frequently.

Hotspot data is separate from your phone's high-speed data allocation. If you have 10GB of hotspot, that's specifically for tethering, not pulled from your phone's unlimited data pool.

Your hotspot uses the same 5G or 4G LTE connection as your phone. In good coverage areas, you can expect speeds comparable to home WiFi - easily fast enough for video calls, streaming, and general work tasks.

Yes! You can connect up to 10 devices to your Vouch Mobile hotspot simultaneously. Perfect for families or connecting your laptop and tablet at the same time.

When you reach your hotspot limit, the hotspot feature pauses until your next billing cycle. Your regular phone service continues unaffected. You can also upgrade your plan mid-cycle if you need more hotspot data.
